bibl.title: Nine Greek Ostraca from the Egyptian Museum.
bibl.note: Nine ostraca from Elephantine: O. Cair. Inv. SR 18955. - 1-2. Two receipts for Δακικὸς ποταμὸς καὶ μισθὸς ποταμοφυλακίδος: 1. Inv. SR 18955 [22]. AD 114; - 2. Inv. SR 18955 [23]. September / October AD 114. - 3. Inv. SR 18955 [24]. Receipt for two percent duty. 13 June AD 115. - 4. Inv. SR 18955 [25]. Receipt for harbour dues. 25 April AD 119. - 5. Inv. SR 18955 [26]. Receipt for μερισμὸς ποταμοφυλακίδος. AD 120/1. - 6. Inv. SR 18955 [27]. Receipt for λαογραφία and δεσμοφυλακία. AD 122. - 7. Inv. SR 18955 [28]. Receipt for the survey-tax on date-land. 17 December AD 124. - 8. Inv. SR 18955 [29]. Receipt for λαογραφία, δεσμοφυλακία and μερισμὸς ἐπικεφαλίου ἀνακεχωρηκότων. 15 August AD 133. - 9. Inv. SR 18955 [30]. Receipt for poll tax. 20 December AD 164.
bibl.seg: Shereen A. Aly, Nine Greek Ostraca from the Egyptian Museum.

Nine ostraca from Elephantine: O. Cair. Inv. SR 18955. - 1-2. Two receipts for Δακικὸς ποταμὸς καὶ μισθὸς ποταμοφυλακίδος: 1. Inv. SR 18955 [22]. AD 114; - 2. Inv. SR 18955 [23]. September / October AD 114. - 3. Inv. SR 18955 [24]. Receipt for two percent duty. 13 June AD 115. - 4. Inv. SR 18955 [25]. Receipt for harbour dues. 25 April AD 119. - 5. Inv. SR 18955 [26]. Receipt for μερισμὸς ποταμοφυλακίδος. AD 120/1. - 6. Inv. SR 18955 [27]. Receipt for λαογραφία and δεσμοφυλακία. AD 122. - 7. Inv. SR 18955 [28]. Receipt for the survey-tax on date-land. 17 December AD 124. - 8. Inv. SR 18955 [29]. Receipt for λαογραφία, δεσμοφυλακία and μερισμὸς ἐπικεφαλίου ἀνακεχωρηκότων. 15 August AD 133. - 9. Inv. SR 18955 [30]. Receipt for poll tax. 20 December AD 164.
